allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add professional React + TypeScript frontend with dark mode

Built a complete, modern frontend for InvestMateAI with:
- React 19 + TypeScript + Vite for fast development
- Tailwind CSS 4 with dark mode support
- Fully responsive design (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- Clean component architecture with reusable UI elements

Features implemented:
- Landing page with logo placeholder
- Login and registration for agents
- Agent dashboard with quick actions
- AI-powered chat interface for property search
- Property management (add properties, upload images)
- Chat insights and analytics
- Context providers for theme and authentication
- API integration utilities with type safety

All pages are mobile-responsive and support dark mode.

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
